snippet: Armenian President Serzh Sarksyan accused Turkey of "utter denial" of what Armenia sees as the genocide of Armenians by the Ottoman Empire 99 years ago, but said his country does not consider Turks its enemy....

headline.print_headline: Armenian Leader Says Ankara Denies 'Genocide' but Turks Not Enemy
headline.main: Armenian Leader Says Ankara Denies 'Genocide' but Turks Not Enemy

lead_paragraph: Armenian President Serzh Sarksyan accused Turkey of "utter denial" of what Armenia sees as the genocide of Armenians by the Ottoman Empire 99 years ago, but said his country does not consider Turks its enemy.
